name: Kuhl Lea Pullover - Women's
description: For cool nights by the campfire, crisp mornings on the trail or sunset sessions on the beach, the Lea Pullover has you covered. The lightweight fabric wards off the chill and stretches to move with you. The snuggly cowl neck, kangaroo pocket and thumb loops add a bit of extra coziness.Made of soft and lightweight heathered polyester with a hint of spandex for stretch.Sewn with low-bulk DYNAMIK™ stitching for more stretch and strength compared to traditional flatlock.Cowl neck with draw cord.Kangaroo handwarmer pocket.Thumb loops.
